general.name: datasweep-index
general.description: File describing the location of each field in the calibObj sweep files, to make spatial searches on the sweep faster. Versions exist for the galaxies, stars, and sky sweeps. Given an RA and Dec one can use this file to find the nearby fields and find what the lines of the relevant sweep files are that you need to read.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu0.name: PRIMARY
hdu0.description: For IDL users, idlutils has a routine "sdss_sweep_circle" which utilizes these sweep indices to do very fast spatial searches (you can retrieve all objects within 3 deg radius in less than a minute). Example file: datasweep-index-gal.fits

hdu1.description: For IDL users, idlutils has a routine "sdss_sweep_circle" which utilizes these sweep indices to do very fast spatial searches (you can retrieve all objects within 3 deg radius in less than a minute). Example file: datasweep-index-gal.fits
